page.title: 10ABERDEEN: FOOTBALL CLUB.
page.content:
ABERDEEN FOOTBALL CLUB.
Aberdeen Football Club's ground is called Pittodrie Stadium, at the east end of our area.
In recent years A.F.C. has been very successful - having won the Premier League and European Cup Winner's Cup - and thus have been able to modernise their ground until it is now one of the best in Britain seating, as it does a capicity crowd of 24,000.
Unlike some clubs, Aberdeen does not attract many "soccer hooligans" and a Saturday football match is still considered a family outing.
